title: NFL ATL: Turkey Day recap, Week 13 preview
itunes:title: NFL ATL: Turkey Day recap, Week 13 preview
description:
A room full of heroes, Gregg Rosenthal, Dan Hanzus and Marc Sessler recap the Thanksgiving Day matchups and preview all of the Week 13 games.  Don’t miss the gang’s hero picks and predictions for each game. Join the conversation on Twitter: @NFL_ATL or #NFLATL.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
